document_data.mainbody:
warfhome was a lawful good-aligned astral dominion, home to the dwarf god Moradin and his wife, the goddess Berronar Truesilver. Located on Mount Celestia, on its fourth layer Solania, it was the home of the dwarven pantheon.
Moradin made his domain, along with his wife Berronar and the other dwarven deities, in a vast dwarven mansion called Erackinor located on the slopes of Solania. Here existed the giant Soul Forges,
